content: अदब्ध, --दंभ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न. त.] <ab>Ved.</ab> Unbroken or unimpaired, unhurt, uninjured; pure, true; °असु, or °आयुः having uninjured or pure life; leaving uninjured the man who sacrifices; °धीति, °व्रत whose works or religious observances are unimpaired.
अदंभ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Honest, undeceitful. --भः {@--1@} Honesty, absence of deceit. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva.
